element:
http://www.xulplanet.com/tutorials/xultu/xblevents.html http://www.xulplanet.com/reference/elemref/ref_xblhandlers.html Used to hold xbl elements, which are used to declare event handlers.
A unique identifier so that you can identify the handlers with. You can use this as a parameter to getElementById and other DOM functions and to reference the element in style sheets.
